variantrule.name: Find Steed Variant
entries: The {@spell find steed|phb} spell can sometimes seem underwhelming and limited. This supplement provides a number of {@filter new steeds|bestiary|source=j:steeds|miscellaneous=} as options to be summoned by the spell. These steeds are more more powerful and more varied. They also allow the caster to decide its size, appearance and sometimes their forms. The steeds also use the caster's proficiency bonus and the level of the spell slot used.

The DM decides which steeds are allowed and how a caster can gain the ability to summon them. They might simply add some or all of new steeds to the list of options in the spell itself. Alternatively, they might choose to only grant certain steeds to certain characters, perhaps reflecting something about that character or via some magic item or boon. For example, a warrior from the feywild might be able to summon a large blink wolf as a {@creature fey steed|J:steeds} with the spell. Or a player character might uncover a magic horseshoe belonging to a long dead legendary horse, allowing them to summon the horse's ghostly spirit as a {@creature undead steed|J:steeds}.
